Package org.blockchainnative.annotations

Annotation Type SmartContract

  • @Retention(RUNTIME)
@Target(TYPE)
public @interface SmartContract
    Marks an interface as representation of a smart contract.
    The usage of this annotation is optional.
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    ContractInfoBuilder

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element Description
      java.lang.String value
      Explicitly specifies the identifier smart contract.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        java.lang.String value
        Explicitly specifies the identifier smart contract.
        The identifier is used to differentiate between multiple instances of the same contract interface, therefore specifying it via this annotation only makes sense for contracts only a single instance.
        If no identifier is specified (i.e. an empty string), the identifier can be specified via the ContractInfoBuilder, or otherwise a random identifier will be generated.
        Returns:
        identifier of the smart contract
        Default:
        ""
